entries.name: INSECURE_METHOD
entries.desc:
List of insecure methods.
These methods are not callable via dRuby.

entries.name: config
entries.desc: The configuration of this DRbServer

entries.name: front
entries.desc: The front object of the DRbServer. This object receives remote method calls made on the server's URI alone, with an object id.

entries.name: thread
entries.desc: The main thread of this DRbServer. This is the thread that listens for and accepts connections from clients, not that handles each client's request-response session.

entries.name: uri
entries.desc: The URI of this DRbServer.

entries.name: default_acl(acl)
entries.desc: Set the default access control list to acl.  The default ACL is nil.

entries.name: default_argc_limit(argc)
entries.desc: Set the default value for the :argc_limit option.

entries.name: default_id_conv(idconv)
entries.desc: Set the default value for the :id_conv option.

entries.name: default_load_limit(sz)
entries.desc: Set the default value for the :load_limit option.

entries.name: new(uri=nil, front=nil, config_or_acl=nil)
entries.desc: Create a new DRbServer instance.

entries.name: verbose()
entries.desc: Get the default value of the :verbose option.

entries.name: verbose=(on)
entries.desc: Set the default value of the :verbose option.

entries.name: alive?()
entries.desc: Is this server alive?

entries.name: check_insecure_method(obj, msg_id)
entries.desc: Check that a method is callable via dRuby.

entries.name: here?(uri)
entries.desc: Is uri the URI for this server?

entries.name: stop_service()
entries.desc: Stop this server.

entries.name: to_id(obj)
entries.desc: Convert a local object to a dRuby reference.

entries.name: to_obj(ref)
entries.desc: Convert a dRuby reference to the local object it refers to.

entries.name: verbose()
entries.desc: Get whether the server is in verbose mode.

entries.name: verbose=(v)
entries.desc: Set whether to operate in verbose mode.
